thread.title: 17 breweries to visit in your lifetime
thread.title_full: 17 breweries to visit in your lifetime

author: Sophie-Claire Hoeller
title: 17 breweries to visit in your lifetime
text:
Courtesy of Church Brew Works Church Brew Works is located inside a former Roman Catholic church in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. 
Every country has its local beer with its own local flavor. 
Often the best way to experience the beer is to go straight to the source: the brewery where it's made. 
We found some of the most scenic and interesting breweries around the world. 
Every beer lover should add these 17 spots to their bucket lists.
